model.name: views
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW fdsaView ( RowId integer, doublenum double, booleanvalue boolean, intnum long, longnum long, floatnum double, bytenum bigdecimal, stringkey string, objectvalue blob, stringnum string, bigintegervalue bigdecimal, datevalue date, charvalue string, timevalue time, bigdecimalvalue bigdecimal, timestampvalue timestamp, intkey long, shortvalue long, doublenum double, booleanvalue boolean, intnum long, longnum long, floatnum double, bytenum bigdecimal, stringkey string, objectvalue blob, stringnum string, bigintegervalue bigdecimal, datevalue date, charvalue string, timevalue time, bigdecimalvalue bigdecimal, timestampvalue timestamp, intkey long, shortvalue long, PRIMARY KEY(RowId) ) AS ;

model.name: ds1
model.metadata:
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE smalla ( doublenum double DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"doublenum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Float'), booleanvalue boolean DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"booleanvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Boolean', "RADIX" '0'), intnum long DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"intnum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Integer'), longnum long DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"longnum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Integer'), floatnum double DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"floatnum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Float'), bytenum bigdecimal(8) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"bytenum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Numeric'), stringkey string(20) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"stringkey"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Varchar'), objectvalue blob(32000000) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"objectvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Long Varbinary'), stringnum string(20) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"stringnum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Varchar'), bigintegervalue bigdecimal(38) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"bigintegervalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Numeric'), datevalue date DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"datevalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Date'), charvalue string(1) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"charvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Char'), timevalue time DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"timevalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Time'), bigdecimalvalue bigdecimal(16) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"bigdecimalvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Numeric'), timestampvalue timestamp DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"timestampvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Timestamp'), intkey long NOT NULL DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"intkey"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Integer'), shortvalue long DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"shortvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Integer') ) OPTIONS ("UPDATABLE" 'TRUE', "NAMEINSOURCE" '"smalla"');
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE smallb ( doublenum double DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"doublenum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Float'), booleanvalue boolean DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"booleanvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Boolean', "RADIX" '0'), intnum long DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"intnum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Integer'), longnum long DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"longnum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Integer'), floatnum double DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"floatnum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Float'), bytenum bigdecimal(8) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"bytenum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Numeric'), stringkey string(20) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"stringkey"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Varchar'), objectvalue blob(32000000) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"objectvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Long Varbinary'), stringnum string(20) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"stringnum"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Varchar'), bigintegervalue bigdecimal(38) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"bigintegervalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Numeric'), datevalue date DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"datevalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Date'), charvalue string(1) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"charvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Char'), timevalue time DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"timevalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Time'), bigdecimalvalue bigdecimal(16) DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"bigdecimalvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Numeric'), timestampvalue timestamp DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"timestampvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Timestamp'), intkey long NOT NULL DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"intkey"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Integer'), shortvalue long DEFAULT '' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"shortvalue"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'Integer') ) OPTIONS ("UPDATABLE" 'TRUE', "NAMEINSOURCE" '"smallb"');
